name: sbom-component-lld2d-1.2
description: Discovered third-party component lld2d version RELEASE 1.2. This is a proprietary link layer topology discovery daemon. The version information was obtained from the version string within the binary file. No relevant CVE records were found in the NVD database.

name: sbom-component-busybox-1.01
description: Discovered third-party component BusyBox version v1.01 (2015.09.21-09:21+0000). This version is linked via the `usr/bin/tftp` symbolic link to `bin/busybox`, with version information confirmed from strings output. No CVE records for this specific version were found in the NVD database.
notes: BusyBox 1.01 is a very old version (2015) that may contain unpatched vulnerabilities. It is recommended to check the security advisories from the device manufacturer.

name: sbom-component-busybox-1.01-updated
description: Confirm the BusyBox version v1.01 (2015.09.21-09:21+0000) in the bin/busybox binary file. This version was released in 2015 and may contain undisclosed security vulnerabilities. No CVE records for this version were found in the NVD database.
notes: Consider checking other vulnerability databases such as ExploitDB, or consider upgrading to the latest stable version of BusyBox.

name: sbom-component-busybox-1.01
